summary: This mod adds 30 companions based on the heroes from the popular rpg Fire Emblem Awakening.
descriptionHtml:
Introduction:
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8546/8621597231_fb2b977d89_z.jpg[/img]

This mod adds 30 companions based on the heroes from the game Fire Emblem Awakening. These characters ventured through the outrelm gate, to assist in the outrelms, when they mysteriously were transported to Skyrim. For several years they have tried to find a way back home, but to no avail. Now the heroes have split up, each finding their own path upon this frozen land. Some still seek answers, while others have intergrated themselves into Skyrim society. Join them in their journeys, and help them find their own destinies.

1st Generation heroes are included.
2nd Generation heroes will be added in next update.

All companions are:
-Marriageable
-Essential
-Local Dismissing
-Equiped with TERA Armors (Check Inventory)
